name: MageBoy
description:
Fixed version : we just get rid of 3 lines of code who block the player at the 4th level. You now have access to the whole game. We didn't change anything else.

________________________________________________________________________

Play as MageBoy in this little game made for #GBJam8

Your goal is to defeat all ennemies planning the route of your magic ball !

Arrow : move

Key A : use the wind spell

Key B  : use the teleport spell

Maintain A  (or press Enter) : validate your sequence Maintain B (or press Suppr) : delete your last input
________________________________________________________________________

Horace Ribout - Programming

Jérémy Guarober - Sound Design 

Constance Gautier - Pixel Art

Perrine Pau - Pixel Art

Hugo Bombail - Game Design & Programming

Jean Claisse - Special help for Level Design
